resource.chars:
The author has evidently devoted much 
time and labour to the production of this
paper. It is illustrated by numerous preparations 
and by many beautiful drawings. Its defects 
appear to me to be due, not to a deficiency 
of work, but rather to the fact that the 
enquiry is one which the author was not 
thoroughly qualified, by his previous labours,
to undertake.
I must in conclusion express my opinion 
that it is not fitted for a place in the 
Philosophical Transactions, nor do I believe 
that its publication in its present form 
would prove to be of advantage to the best 
interests of its author.
Wm S. Savory 
March. 1861.
